levels.description:
Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to the target and inflicts <$ba.fear>Fear</> for <@ba.vup>{fear}</> seconds, also dealing an equal amount of Arts splash damage around the target; both instances deal an additional <@ba.vup>{ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> of Arts damage as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>. If the target hit is under the burst effect of Necrosis damage, the damage dealt by Talent 1 increases to <@ba.vup>{element_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK
<@ba.rem>Can store {ct} charge(s)</>
